Jon Spivack

Guitar - Performance and Instruction

About

Jon Spivack is a parent, an educator, and a musician who has been teaching and performing in the Sacramento area for over 25 years. He has earned a B.A. in Biological Sciences and a Master of Arts in Special Education at California State University, Sacramento. Jon enjoys teaching and sharing his love and enthusiasm for music. He has taught in a wide variety of settings, both in the classroom and as private instructor in the studio. His new Jazz/Folk/Blues CD, Branching Out, is now available on CD Baby.
